com.xlpoolsion.server.controller.levels

Class BaseLevelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xlpoolsion.server.controller.levels.BaseLevelController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleLevelController

    public abstract class BaseLevelController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the creation and deletion of bodies in the level
